<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given a ConvergenceRegion tree with |Start| as its root, finds the smallest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// region |Entry| belongs to. If |Entry| does not belong to the region defined</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by |Start|, this function returns |nullptr|.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spirv/anonymous-spirvconvergenceregionanalysis-cpp-/#a2846f57b5b41783866a21eca418ed4b3"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirv/convergenceregion">ConvergenceRegion</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/spirv/anonymous-spirvconvergenceregionanalysis-cpp-/#a2846f57b5b41783866a21eca418ed4b3">findParentRegion</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirv/convergenceregion">ConvergenceRegion</a> &#42;Start,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Entry) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirv/convergenceregion">ConvergenceRegion</a> &#42;Candidate = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirv/convergenceregion">ConvergenceRegion</a> &#42;NextCandidate = Start;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Candidate != NextCandidate &amp;&amp; NextCandidate != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Candidate = NextCandidate;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NextCandidate = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// End of the search, we can return.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Candidate-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirv/convergenceregion/#a03d34ea2d838e32c2f5b374a650090c7">Children</a>.size() == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Candidate;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Child : Candidate-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirv/convergenceregion/#a03d34ea2d838e32c2f5b374a650090c7">Children</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Child-&gt;Blocks.count(Entry) != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NextCandidate = Child;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Candidate;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// anonymous namespace</span></CodeLine>
